parameters.name: AcceptLanguage
parameters.description: The language in which you want to display the results. Valid values: zh and en. zh indicates Chinese, which is the default value. en indicates English.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the lane group.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The name of the MSE namespace that you want to query.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag based on which you want to list applications.
